Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a wealth of features and benefits that are tailored to enhance your experience. Given its quality and capabilities, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering its immense value, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $15000. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
